overview: This release contains a series of live performances by the ska influenced rock band Sublime dating from the mid nineties. Over a dozen songs are featured during the course of the collection including "Date Rape," "We're Gonna Die for Our Own Arrogance," "40 Oz. To Freedom," and "Let's Go Get Stoned." The DVD release of the collection offers additional footage. ~ Perry Seibert, Rovi
tagline: Everyday I wake up just a little bit more/feelin' like a dog out in the yard/because that's just how we are
title: Sublime: Live '94-'96
